document.full_text: prime minister vladimir v. putin sang and played piano at a charity event for children with cancer, but the mother of a sick girl said the aid never arrived and questioned mr. putin?s involvement.
document.title: russian charity event drew putin, but perhaps no money
lines_and_colors: prime minister vladimir v. putin sang and played piano at a charity event for children with cancer, but the mother of a sick girl said the aid never arrived and questioned mr. putin?s involvement.
